channel.title: Login Help

item.title: Login Help
item.dc:creator: @eagledude4 eagledude4
item.description:
@eagledude4 wrote:

alright, what I want to do announce when a mod or an admin signs in in 2 ways:

1:

if(playerRights == 1) { println("Mod: "+playerName+" has logged in."); if(playerRights == 2) { println("Admin: "+playerName+" has logged in.") }else { println("Player: "+playerName+" has logged in.");

2:

if(playerRights == 1) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll ="Mod: "+playerName+" has logged in."; if(playerRights == 2) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll ="Admin: "+playerName+" has logged in."; }else { PlayerHandler.messageToAll ="Player: "+playerName+" has logged in.";

I want to integrate this into:

clientSessionKey = inStream.readQWord(); serverSessionKey = inStream.readQWord(); int UID = inStream.readDWord(); playerName = inStream.readString(); playerName.toLowerCase(); if(playerName == null || playerName.length() == 0) disconnected = true; playerPass = inStream.readString(); println(playerName+" has logged in."); if(UID == -74352552) println(playerName+" has logged in using XeroScape cheat client");

How do I do it?

Read full topic
